noPermission.description_embed: You do not have permission to use this command!
noPermission.description_embed_no_features: The function is currently disabled. An administrator needs to enable it for it to be usable.

addCommand.description_embed: You have successfully set the reaction role for the role {0}. Now, when a user reacts to the message, the role will be assigned.
addCommand.description_embed_alreadyset: The reaction role you are trying to set already exists. There cannot be a reaction role with the same emoji.
addCommand.description_embed_missingpermissions: The role you are trying to set/remove is above the role {0}, which belongs to Alka. To set/remove it from the list, move Alka's role above the role you want to set.
addCommand.description_embed_channelnotfound: The message is not in the same channel where the interaction is taking place. Run the command in the channel where the message to which you want to set your reaction roles is located.
addCommand.description_embed_emojinotfound: The selected emoji was not found on your server. Please insert a valid emoji!

listCommand.description_embed: {0} Here is the list of Reaction Roles currently set.
listCommand.no_role: No reaction roles set yet, set them with /reactionrole.

removeCommand.description_embed: Hai rimosso con successo la reaction role. Ora non è più disponibile
removeCommand.description_embed_notset: La reaction role che stai cercando non esiste nei nostri database, riprova.
removeCommand.description_embed_missingpermissions: Il ruolo che stai cercando di impostare/rimuovere si trova sopra al ruolo {0}, che appartiene ad Alka. Per poterlo impostare/rimuovere dalla lista, sposta il ruolo di Alka al di sopra del ruolo che vuoi impostare.
removeCommand.description_embed_channelnotfound: Il messaggio non si trova nello stesso canale in cui viene eseguita l'interazione. Esegui il comando nel canale in cui si trova il messaggio a cui vuoi rimuovere i tuoi reaction role.
removeCommand.description_embed_emojinotfound: L'emoji selezionata non è stata trovata nel tuo server. Inserisci un emoji valida!
